1.content:
Brian, a 16 year old cocky boy that has a rather high charisma, eventually he learns that once his stats get so high, he can start to control people around them- and eventually, even how they look

Lisa, A 17 year old girl that is quite clever (and kinky ;) She’s learned the ins and outs of the game and knows quite a few exploits she can use to get what she wants

Jack, A 15 year old boy that has somehow found a way to hack the game, he can go beyond exploits, beyond even needing to level up, this is his world now and he will impress his kinky wishes on the whole world as he sees fit

Sarah, An 18 year old girl that discovers some magical item, it draws on her own strength and allows her some reality warping abilities ;)
1.title: Choose your character

info.brief_description: The world is a video game- and you are going to use that in a lot of kinky ways.
info.description:
The world is a video game, plain and simple, everything from menus to leveling up your stats. You, are one of four different people, who all use this world to their advantage in different ways.



This is a transformation based story, make changes to character and the game as a whole as you see fit! But there are some main themes the story should revolve around:

Growth, wheather it’s giantess, breast expansion, or straight up weight gain go for it ^^

Increasing sexiness, don’t make people uglier(unless you’re into that I guess ;p) basically just pervert the world as best you can



Some things to avoid:

Scat, Gore, and overly descriptive Vore.


Characters:


Brian, a 16 year old cocky boy that has a rather high charisma, eventually he learns that once his stats get so high, he can start to control people around them- and eventually, even how they look

Lisa, A 17 year old girl that is quite clever (and kinky ;) She’s learned the ins and outs of the game and knows quite a few exploits she can use to get what she wants

Jack, A 15 year old boy that has somehow found a way to hack the game, he can go beyond exploits, beyond even needing to level up, this is his world now and he will impress his kinky wishes on the whole world as he sees fit

Sarah, An 18 year old girl that discovers some magical item, it draws on her own strength and allows her some reality warping abilities ;)
